ModMetaData.name: Mechanized Armor Set
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds Mechanized Armor Set
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Mechanized Helm - Mechanized Plate Armor - Mechanized_Musket
[h1]ResearchPrerequisite:[/h1] - SteamPrototypes: Mechanized Helm,Plate Armor, Musket
collaboration project with "-/]rchon" and "JangoDsoul" from "Rimworld Mod Market" Discord.
"This mod comes with the ability to choose which era the research and item set appear in, with the choice of Medieval or Industrial through the mod settings manager "
[h1]Disclaimer/Warning:[/h1] "To avoid any bugs and issues please choose the tech era you desire through the mod settings manager BEFORE generating a new world"
[h1]Credits:[/h1] -/]rchon- Main Artist for the Apparel -JangoDsoul- Artist retexture in Vector and XML coder -CaptainMuscles - C# coder "Pizzacat_MechanizedArmor.dll"
[url=https://discord.gg/7B7xqHh][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
